amendment.description: Line 6 on the first page, strike "No" and insert "Except as provided in subsection (c), no" After line 18 on the first page, insert the following: (c) Exception- Subsection (a) does not apply with respect to a claim for monetary relief arising from a foreign-made product.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Cohen amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cohen.
